import Mathlib

section

variable {G G' : Type*}
variable [Group G] [Group G']
variable (œÜ : G ‚Üí* G')
variable (N : Subgroup G)

/-- If œÜ : G ‚Üí* G' is surjective and N ‚´≤ G (expressed by the conjugation condition), then the image
    subgroup œÜ(N) = N.map œÜ is normal in G'. We state normality by the conjugation property in G'. -/
lemma Herstein_exercise_2_7_7
  (hN : ‚àÄ g n, n ‚àà N ‚Üí g * n * g‚Åª¬π ‚àà N)
  (hœÜ : Surjective (œÜ : G ‚Üí G')) :
  ‚àÄ g' m, m ‚àà (N.map œÜ) ‚Üí g' * m * g'‚Åª¬π ‚àà N.map œÜ := by sorry

end

import Mathlib
open Function

section

variable {G G' : Type*}
variable [Group G] [Group G']
variable (œÜ : G ‚Üí* G')
variable (N : Subgroup G)

/-- If œÜ : G ‚Üí* G' is surjective and N ‚´≤ G (expressed by the conjugation condition), then the image
    subgroup œÜ(N) = N.map œÜ is normal in G'. We state normality by the conjugation property in G'. -/
lemma Herstein_exercise_2_7_7
  (hœÜ : Surjective (œÜ : G ‚Üí G'))
  (hN : ‚àÄ g n, n ‚àà N ‚Üí g * n * g‚Åª¬π ‚àà N) :
  ‚àÄ g' m, m ‚àà (N.map œÜ) ‚Üí g' * m * g'‚Åª¬π ‚àà N.map œÜ := by sorry

end
